long_description: Designed specifically for the needs of young anglers, the lightweight, durable Columbia Tamiami Shirt for girls dries fast and protects skin with built-in UV protection during long hours in the sun. Ripstop polyester with Omni-Shade(R) UPF 40 provides protection from damaging solar rays. Venting at center back keeps cool air flowing through. The Columbia Tamiami Shirt features a rod holder and roll-up sleeves.
short_description: Designed specifically for the needs of young anglers, the lightweight, durable Columbia Tamiami Shirt for girls dries fast and protects skin with built-in UV protection during long hours in the sun.
